feed.title: DefGuard Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v0.11.0
entry.content:
We have focused on stability, business logs improvements and bug squashing in these release - but also have done some features:

New Features

Account disabling/enabling :star:

Now you can disable or enable a user account (by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/640)

Important: LDAP support for this feature is not implemented yet. See https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/issues/660 for status.

Core & Proxy DEB & RPM packages

Upon a lot of requests we have added (besides docker/kubernetes) a pure package distribution of core & proxy (gateway already had it done for some time). Done by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/649

Other Changes

  • feat: add warning when removing a group by @wojcik91 in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/628
  • feat: add new logo by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/646
  • Add more logging by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/645

Fixes

  • fix: mfa login screen styles by @j-chmielewski in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/629
  • fix: sync WireGuard locations allowed devices after removing user group by @wojcik91 in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/630
  • fix: make config structure valid if some fields are missing by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/637
  • fix: add workaround for wrong config file extension on some browsers by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/638
  • fix: verify mfa status during openid authorization by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/641
  • fix: invalidate all user sessions when MFA is enabled by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/644
  • fix: fix frontend linter errors by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/651
  • fix: prevent from adding duplicate public keys by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/655
  • Fix down migrations by @moubctez in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/658
  • Fix for #661 by @moubctez in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/662

entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.0.0
entry.content:
🎉 Now you can support our development efforts! 🎉

We are introducing Enterprise License with unique features not available in the Open Source Open Core:

🔐 Ability to use external OIDC (Google/Microsoft/Custom) to login or create a defguard account.

💥 Real time sync for client configurations! First WireGuard client to support this feature!

🛑 Ability to disable users to manage their devices (just admins will have this possibility).

✖︎ Ability to disable users to configure WireGuard clients other than defguard desktop client.

🚦Ability to disable All traffic in the desktop client - just predefined traffic.

🔜 …More features will come soon!

Please consider buying the enterprise license to support us!

The whole defguard team thanks you! 🫡

🔥 New features (Open Source Open Core & Enterprise) 🔥

  • core & proxy have now HTTP & gRPC healthchecks
  • new MFA email messages to easily copy the code
  • Multiple DNS servers support & search domain support
  • Proxy and Gateway have better gRPC connection handling when a disconnect occurs
  • New Kubernetes HELM charts (thanks to Prusa3D Research team ❤️ … and a lot of 🐛 bugfixes!

Desktop Client Major Upgrade

  • Rewrite of the whole routing stack (on all platforms) with IPv6 support
  • Tray menu for quick connect/disconnect
  • Multiple DNS servers support
  • Search domain support
  • Settings menu has a new section displaying all log messages
  • All log messages have been rewritten for better support and knowledge of what’s going on

📖 Upgrade notes

Please remember to read the upgrade notes before doing the upgrade!

entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.1.0
entry.content:
🎉 All Enterprise features are free! 🎉

All Enterprise features (within certain limits) are now free and do not require a license. Limits should be more than sufficient for home, small business, and student use. More details here.

Further improvements:

🔐 Ability to use external OIDC for secure remote enrollment and Desktop client configuration

🔏 External OIDC now supports code authorization flow - extending Custom OIDC support to Okta, JumpCloud, Zitadel and others..

🛜 Fixed IPv6 configuration in the Location settings

Please consider buying the enterprise license to support us!

The whole defguard team thanks you! 🫡

Detailed changes

  • Fix ipv6 input and database adminid constraints by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/851
  • Enable enterprise features when within certain limits by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/852
  • OpenID via Proxy by @moubctez in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/845
  • Add external oidc tests by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/855
  • Remove web3 functionality from frontend, update docs links by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/857

New Contributors

  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/848

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.1.1
entry.content:
Quick fix release

  • Fix enterprise settings sometimes not taking effect immediately, log gateway's token rejection reason by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/865

🎉 1.1.x: All Enterprise features are free! 🎉

All Enterprise features (within certain limits) are now free and do not require a license. Limits should be more than sufficient for home, small business, and student use. More details here.

Further improvements:

🔐 Ability to use external OIDC for secure remote enrollment and Desktop client configuration

🔏 External OIDC now supports code authorization flow - extending Custom OIDC support to Okta, JumpCloud, Zitadel and others..

🛜 Fixed IPv6 configuration in the Location settings

Please consider buying the enterprise license to support us!

The whole defguard team thanks you! 🫡

Detailed changes

  • Fix ipv6 input and database adminid constraints by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/851
  • Enable enterprise features when within certain limits by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/852
  • OpenID via Proxy by @moubctez in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/845
  • Add external oidc tests by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/855
  • Remove web3 functionality from frontend, update docs links by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/857

New Contributors

  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/848

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.1.2
entry.content:
Quick fix release

  • Make smtp password and email optional by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/869

🎉 1.1.x: All Enterprise features are free! 🎉

All Enterprise features (within certain limits) are now free and do not require a license. Limits should be more than sufficient for home, small business, and student use. More details here.
